channel.title: Save command help
channel.description:
would someone be able to help me a save command so players can save there characters on my server because nobody can save there character when i restart the server or when it roleback it's a 718 server
all i want someone to make is like
case "save": i don't know how to do it but if someone could make it one would appreciated it
thanks yesjxke <3

item.title: Save command help

Would not recommend this. Will cause dupes and other exploits.

item.description:
